General.Name: NeoVolta Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: NeoVolta Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells energy storage systems in the United States. The company provides NV14, NV14-K, and NV 24 energy storage systems, which stores and uses energy through batteries and an inverter at residential or commercial sites. NeoVolta Inc. markets and sells its products directly to certified solar installers and solar equipment distributors. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Poway, California.
General.Address: 13651 Danielson Street, Poway, CA, United States, 92064
